sense.def:
To descend
ali
to descend something
pomeni spustiti ali se pomakniti navzdol;

seg.quote: The valley becomes more exquisite as we descend.
Gloom began to descend on all of them.

sense.def:
Če ljudje
descend on a place
, nenadoma pridejo v neki kraj.

seg.quote: The whole family descended on us without any warning.

sense.def:
Če človek
descends to something
, se vede tako, kot se zanj ne spodobi.

seg.quote: All too soon they will descend to spreading scandal and gossip.
